entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA Hey, Stephen Hahn. If you agree with Liar-in-Chief Trump’s statement that 99% of Covid-19 cases are “harmless,” prove it. Have the balls to get infected on purpose. In fact, have your own damn family infected. We’ll watch and see how harmless it really is.
